item.title: Report X-2024050242
item.description:
Report X-2024050242

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-09T15:13:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-03
  • City: CROFTON
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On April 3rd a package was discovered leaking during the PM sort. The package contained UN1263 Paint Related Material,3, PGIII. The package was contained into a steel salvage drum and is being sent out for disposal.

item.title: Report X-2024050130
item.description:
Report X-2024050130

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-06T15:11:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-01
  • City: SPARROWS POINT
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Package was discovered damaged off work area 258 on the OB sort. The outer container was wet, and the identification arrows were not observed. Upon inspection found 1 bottle of the contents had a loose cap causing the leak of 50oz of the contents.
